comment: Open Channel Management - Channel adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.OpenChannelManagement/master/OpenChannel/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Channel made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: bottomSlope
contents.comment: The bottom slope of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: bottomWidth
contents.comment: The bottom width of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: celerity
contents.comment: Velocity of a surge propagated along the channel after the opening or close of a sluice gate.

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: diameter
contents.comment: The diameter of a circular channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: leftSideSlope
contents.comment: The slope of the left bank of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: length
contents.comment: The length of the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: maxWaterDepth
contents.comment: The maximum allowable water depth in the channel. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: rightSideSlope
contents.comment: The slope of the right bank of the channel (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

contents.name: roughnessCoefficient
contents.comment: The Manning’s roughness coefficient.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tag
contents.comment: An optional text string used to qualify an item

contents.name: travelDuration
contents.comment: The duration of the surge travelling from the downstream node (i.e., Regulation Structure) to the upstream node.

contents.name: waterLoss
contents.comment: Water leakages/losses from the channel - percentage of flow of the channel or a number (flow).

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
